trans-unit.source: Prerequisites <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">to Linux Agents Installation</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: Prerequisites <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">to Linux Agents Installation</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: Prérequis <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">à l'installation des agents Linux</MadCap:conditionalText>

trans-unit.source: Before installing <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Linux Agents, check the following prerequisites (<MadCap:xref href="#Prerequisites_to_Linux_agent_installation" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

seg-source.mrk: Before installing <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Linux Agents, check the following prerequisites (<MadCap:xref href="#Prerequisites_to_Linux_agent_installation" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: Avant d'installer les agents Linux <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, vérifiez les prérequis suivants (<MadCap:xref href="#Prerequisites_to_Linux_agent_installation" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>) :

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites to Linux agent installation

seg-source.mrk: Prerequisites to Linux agent installation

target.mrk: Conditions préalables à l’installation des agents Linux

trans-unit.source: Prerequisite

seg-source.mrk: Prerequisite

target.mrk: Conditions préalables

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Operating System

seg-source.mrk: Operating System

target.mrk: Système d’exploitation

trans-unit.source: To find out the list of supported Operating Systems, see the Compatibility Guide.

seg-source.mrk: To find out the list of supported Operating Systems, see the Compatibility Guide.

target.mrk: Pour connaître la liste des systèmes d’exploitation pris en charge, consultez le Guide de compatibilité .

alt-trans.seg-source: To find out the list of supported Operating Systems, see the Compatibility Guide.
alt-trans.target: Pour connaître la liste des systèmes d'exploitation pris en charge, consultez le Guide de compatibilité .

trans-unit.source: Memory

seg-source.mrk: Memory

target.mrk: Mémoire

trans-unit.source: A minimum of 512 MB of RAM is required.

seg-source.mrk: A minimum of 512 MB of RAM is required.

target.mrk: Un minimum de 512 Mo de RAM est nécessaire.

trans-unit.source: Database Directory

seg-source.mrk: Database Directory

target.mrk: Répertoire de la base de données

trans-unit.source: The database requires approximately 1% of the volume of the protected data in disk space, but can use up to 10% if you have a large number of files.

seg-source.mrk: The database requires approximately 1% of the volume of the protected data in disk space, but can use up to 10% if you have a large number of files.

target.mrk: La base de données nécessite environ 1 % du volume des données protégées en espace disque, mais peut utiliser jusqu'à 10 % si vous avez un grand nombre de fichiers.

trans-unit.source: Setup Directory

seg-source.mrk: Setup Directory

target.mrk: Répertoire du programme d’installation

trans-unit.source: The directory path where you launch the setup must not contain space characters as this is currently not supported.

seg-source.mrk: The directory path where you launch the setup must not contain space characters as this is currently not supported.

target.mrk: Le chemin du répertoire depuis lequel vous lancez le programme d’installation ne doit contenir aucun espace car ce caractère n'est pas pris en charge actuellement.

alt-trans.seg-source: The directory path where you launch the setup must not contain space characters as this is not currently supported.
alt-trans.target: Ni le chemin, ni le nom du répertoire où vous allez lancer le programme d’installation ne doivent contenir d’espace.

trans-unit.source: Product Download

seg-source.mrk: Product Download

target.mrk: Téléchargement produit

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you have downloaded the binaries from the Atempo Client Portal: https://support.atempo.com.

seg-source.mrk: Ensure that you have downloaded the binaries from the Atempo Client Portal: https://support.atempo.com.

target.mrk: Assurez-vous d'avoir téléchargé les binaires à partir du portail client Atempo : https://support.atempo.com.

trans-unit.source: Communication Port

seg-source.mrk: Communication Port

target.mrk: Port de communication

trans-unit.source: If you want to connect to the Agent interface remotely, for instance to perform remote restores, port 27261 must be open on your firewall.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to connect to the Agent interface remotely, for instance to perform remote restores, port 27261 must be open on your firewall.

target.mrk: Si vous voulez vous connecter à l’interface de l’agent à distance, par exemple pour effectuer une restauration à distance, le port 27261 doit être ouvert dans votre pare-feu.

trans-unit.source: Language

seg-source.mrk: Language

target.mrk: Langue

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> adopts the language set at the operating system level. Available languages are English and French. Ensure that you set the proper language for the OS.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> adopts the language set at the operating system level.
Available languages are English and French.
Ensure that you set the proper language for the OS.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> adopte la langue définie au niveau du système d'exploitation.
Les langues disponibles sont l’anglais et le français.
Assurez-vous de choisir la langue voulue pour votre système d’exploitation.

trans-unit.source: Packages

seg-source.mrk: Packages

target.mrk: Paquets

trans-unit.source: Some packages may be required, before running the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installer. For an installation on a non-graphical system, there is no requirement. For an installation on a graphical system, using a Gnome environment, run the following commands:

seg-source.mrk: Some packages may be required, before running the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installer.
For an installation on a non-graphical system, there is no requirement.
For an installation on a graphical system, using a Gnome environment, run the following commands:

target.mrk: Certains paquets doivent être installés avant d’exécuter le programme d’installation <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Pour une installation sur un système non graphique, il n'y a aucune condition préalable.
Pour une installation sur un système graphique, utilisant un environnement Gnome, exécutez les commandes suivantes :

trans-unit.source: Debian-based distributions: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libxss1 python-nautilus gnome-shell-extension-top-icons-plus

seg-source.mrk: Debian-based distributions: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libxss1 python-nautilus gnome-shell-extension-top-icons-plus

target.mrk: Distributions basées sur Debian : apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libxss1 python-nautilus gnome-shell-extension-top-icons-plus

trans-unit.source: RPM-based distributions: yum update && yum install libXScrnSaver nautilus-python gnome-shell-extension-top-icons

seg-source.mrk: RPM-based distributions: yum update && yum install libXScrnSaver nautilus-python gnome-shell-extension-top-icons

target.mrk: Distributions basées sur RPM : yum update && yum install libXScrnSaver nautilus-python gnome-shell-extension-top-icons

trans-unit.source: gnome-shell-extension-top-icons is required to enable icon in the Gnome task bar.

seg-source.mrk: gnome-shell-extension-top-icons is required to enable icon in the Gnome task bar.

target.mrk: gnome-shell-extension-top-icons est nécessaire pour activer l'icône dans la barre des tâches de Gnome.

trans-unit.source: For an installation on an Ubuntu environment with a Unity graphical shell, run the following command: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libxss1 python-nautilus python-appindicator python-gtk2

seg-source.mrk: For an installation on an Ubuntu environment with a Unity graphical shell, run the following command: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libxss1 python-nautilus python-appindicator python-gtk2

target.mrk: Pour une installation sur un environnement Ubuntu avec un shell graphique Unity, exécutez la commande suivante : apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libxss1 python-nautilus python-appindicator python-gtk2.

trans-unit.source: python-nautilus (Debian) / nautilus-python (RPM) is required to enable context menus in Nautilus.

seg-source.mrk: python-nautilus (Debian) / nautilus-python (RPM) is required to enable context menus in Nautilus.

target.mrk: python-nautilus (Debian) / nautilus-python (RPM) est nécessaire pour activer les menus contextuels dans Nautilus.

trans-unit.source: For an installation on a CentOS-based distribution, the EPEL repository may need to be enabled (Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux). To find all the required packages, use the following command: yum install epel-release.

seg-source.mrk: For an installation on a CentOS-based distribution, the EPEL repository may need to be enabled (Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux).
To find all the required packages, use the following command: yum install epel-release.

target.mrk: Pour une installation sur un environnement CentOS, il peut être nécessaire d'activer le serveur EPEL (Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux).
Pour trouver tous les packages nécessaires, utilisez la commande suivante : yum install epel-release.
